headline.main: 50 ITALIANS ELUDE BRITISH IN ETHIOPIA; ' Lost Patrol,' All That Remains of African Empire, Believed Living in Mountain Caves

lead_paragraph: ROME, Nov. 29 (U.P.) -- A "lost patrol" of fifty Italian soldiers, fighting in the mountains of Ethiopia, was all that remained today to defend Italy's East African empire.
abstract: Ital patrol reptd eluding Brit in Ethiopia; area and population lost by Itals listed; Gondar surrender revs; Gayda comments

keywords.name: glocations
keywords.value: MEDITERRANEAN, AFRICAN, BALKAN AND NEAR EAST AREAS
